answers.answer: I had a podgy belly anyway so I thought I wasn't showing yet but friends have told me they've noticed my bump im 10 weeks with my second and showing so don't worry you more than likely are showing congratulations
Did u have to have a c section

I'm having that issue too. Sometimes I  don't poo for a day or two (TMI SORRY) and I begin wandering if my little pooch is from pregnancy or me not pooing. I never had washboard abs but I am far from being pudgy either. I had a little and I do mean little pooch already so I can't tell one way or the other. I hope it's my bump coming but it's hard to tell.

So so relieved to know that I am not alone. I also keep wondering whether I am just fatter or whether it's tje bump. Im 12 weeks and a few days ago I looked down to shave and was shocked that I cudnt see more than half my bush just by looking down.  Tried pulling up my not so big but very noticeable pooch and it felt hard. Clothes don't fit d same anymore dats for sure. But I still cant tell whether im just bloated, gaining weight or simply growing a bump.
Take a probiotic to keep regular. This will help make u less miserable and keep things moving.
I was a bit overweight to begin with.  I've always had a little belly pouch.  I'm now 14 weeks and I don't think I have a bump yet but my pants are getting a little snug.

question: Ever since I find out I was pregnant I've been nutrition conscious because I had gestational diabetes with my previous pregnancy. However, that was 10yrz ago! I'm only 12 weeks and I can't tell if this belly is from weight gain or pregnancy! I feel it hard near my hip line, but my bump is fairly noticeable! I was thinking maybe it's from all the acid reflux and bloating? I haven't even been eating much the last 3wks because the nausea and vomiting had me starving cuz nothing stayed in my system... feeling very frustrated and uncomfortable... Can Anyone Relate??? :/
title: baby bump or simply fat! :_(
